text: The 1922 International cricket season was from April 1922 to August 1922. There were no any major international tour held during this season. ==Season overview== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="7" |International tours |- ! rowspan="2" |Start date ! rowspan="2" |Home team ! rowspan="2" |Away team ! colspan="4" |Results [Matches] |- !Test !ODI !FC !LA |- | |Marylebone | |; style="text-align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |0–1 [1] |- | | | |; style="text-align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |0–0 [1] |; style="text-align:center"| — |- | | |Foresters |; style="text-align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |0–2 [3] |; style="text-align:center"| — |- | | |Incogniti |; style="text-align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |0–2 [3] |; style="text-align:center"| — |} ==June== === Scotland in England === {| class="wikitable" |- ! colspan="9"|Three-day Match |- !
